Pre-Game Insights: The Brooklyn Nets (13-21) are 7.5-point underdogs as they host the Philadelphia 76ers (13-19) on Saturday, January 4, 2025 at Barclays Center.
The Nets are 17-15-2 against the spread this season, while the 76ers are 13-19-0.
Brooklyn has a better record against the spread away (13-6-1) compared to home (4-9-1).
Philadelphia has covered the spread in a lower percentage of its home games (4/14) compared to away games (9/18).
The point total for the game is 213.5, with the Nets' games finishing over 50% of the time and the 76ers' games hitting the over 55.6% of the time in away games.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game will be played at Barclays Center in Brooklyn, New York.
